root.name: James Bond: The Duel
root.description: James Bond: The Duel is a game based on the famous M16 agent 007 which unlike many other later titles, is not based on any movie of the franchise. Instead, this Bond game is an original storyline that includes familiar villains of the series such as Jaws and Oddjob. Timothy Dalton's likeness is used in the game and it was published by Domark for the Sega Master System, Sega Mega Drive and Sega Game Gear in 1993 (four years after Dalton's last movie Licence to Kill).
